captions.text:
"Stances"!
Dani, Elidio and Mari will play.
Daniel and Mari will do a scene,

and Elidio will propose
some challenges to them.

He'll make a stance in the scene,
and they will have to

do the same stance, and they'll
justify why they are doing that.

For starters, I'd like
to know your profession.

- Lawyer. - So, with a 'lawyer'
we start the "Stances Game", now.

Permission to speak,
your honor.
You may speak.

Your honor, I ask permission
to take off my hat.

I was going to ask you that.
We can't use hats in the court anymore.
All right.
Your honor, my client...
Go on!

Excuse me for a minute.
I missed my yoga class today...
I'll get off the bench...

I'll do the grasshopper
stance for a minute...

No problem, I'll make my
explanations while you do your yoga.

- Please...
- My client, as you all know...

- I'm going back.
- Has an evidence.

An evidence that will contradict
everything said by the other lawyer.

- Did you bring that evidence?
- As a matter of fact, I did.

You brought it
hidden in your teeth!

This lettuce in my tooth is an
undeniable proof that my client...
Doesn't use pigtails!

I'd like to know what is the connection
between the lettuce and the pigtail,
but I'll keep doing my yoga.

Because I really need
to concentrate...

- Hold this stance. - The winged chicken
stance is the best one for this.

People usually pull their hair back
when they're eating, right, your honor?
Go on.
And, to pull the hair back... Shit.

And, to pull the hair back,
what do we use, your honor?

I'll be a different kind of judge
and I'll walk around this place!
Sometimes, to pull the hair back...

- A shot!
- Oh, my God!
I'm invading the court!

The shot came from the outside,
your honor, watch out!
Officers!
There, through the window!

What is going on
in my courthouse?

- Who are you?
- I came here to rescue the defendant.
Oh yeah, and who am I?

Tell me, who am I?
Tell me!

I don't know, it's...
The defense lawyer!

- Right.
- I'll free the defendant. Come with me!

I did my part!
I'm off!
Son of a bitch!
I'll chase him... I slipped!
Daniel... Give it a shot!
Do you have an extra pair of pants?

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.

- A gorilla has always more to offer.
- Do you have a free hand?
